DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Age 18 70 year . Able give his/her consent participate study . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Presence cardiac pacemaker , brain stimulator , shrapnel , surgical metal , clip brain , cochlear implant , metal fragment eye . Pregnancy lactation . History serious medical illness hearing problem Intake medication affect central nervous system like anti depressant , antihistamine , antipsychotic , dopamine agonist , benzodiazepine antiepileptic past 3 month . Presence neurological psychiatric illness like brain tumor , migraine , depression , bipolar disorder , schizophrenia . History seizure . Use abuse drug past 6 month intake 7 alcoholic drink week female 14 alcoholic drink week male .
